law.text:
Subject to the hearing provisions of § 16-307 of this subtitle, the Comptroller may deny a county license to an applicant, reprimand a county licensee, or suspend or revoke a county license if the applicant or licensee:
fraudulently or deceptively obtains or attempts to obtain a license for the applicant or licensee or for another person;
fraudulently or deceptively uses a license; or
fails to comply with the Maryland Cigarette Sales Below Cost Act and regulations adopted under it.
